name: Hammer Fruit - Free Smash Kids Game for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch
name_original: Hammer Fruit - Free Smash Kids Game for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch
description:
FREE GAME - Download it today!

Simple - Fun - Addictive this is one game that keeps you coming back for more.

Fun for all ages! The most satisfying way to smash fruit without the mess!

The object is to tap the screen and smash all the fresh fruit and avoid smashing any rotten fruit.

Features:
-Realistic Graphics
-Fun music and sound effects
-Four different play modes
-Challenging Levels
-Ability to pause game
-Leader Board to display top scores

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
* TOP ARCADE GAME APP OF 2013
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
CHECK THE SCREENSHOTS AND SEE FOR YOURSELF!
